title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Enjoying playful bonding time with family and friends comes naturally to you. You may be at the top of your social game now, partly because your communication skills are on point. Your relaxed manner makes it easy for others to open up in your presence, but they can also appreciate that youre primed to spring into action at a moments notice. Whether youre playing tag football or an intense video game, your competitive spirit thrives on the excitement. Businessman Jack Welch wrote, There's no such thing as work-life balance. There are work-life choices and you make them, and they have consequences. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
